    Conference Social Event

    Agenda

    The agenda is yet to be confirmed by the bus company.

    • 08:00 ‚Äî Departure from Department of Computer Science; participants can leave their luggage in the bus.
    • There will likely be two return times, around lunch time and in the evening.
    • We will collect preferred variants of participants upon departure, but it is the participants‚Äô responsibility to arrive at the pick-up points on time.

    Insurance and Risk

    Hiking is a risky activity. Participants join the trip at their own risk; the organiser is not liable. Emergency contact and medical information will be collected before departure. Good footwear, waterproofs, and sufficient water and snacks are recommended.

    Further Participants

    We might have the opportunity to fill empty spaces on the bus with spouses and friends. Please contact the organisers ahead of time.
